summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the construction of a trunk sewer, subsewer, pumping plant and force mains in Shelby Street, from 12th Avenue North to the Alley east thereof, and in certain other streets and avenues, all as a part of the improvement contemplated by Ordinance No. 74615, appropriating additional money therefor from the Seattle Sewer Bonds 1946 Fund; and amending Section 2 of Ordinance No. 75187.
